Reviews.Title: good product
Reviews.Author: loveamazon
Reviews.Content: I bought two right off the bat, been looking for weeks for a cheap but good tablet that has flash, camera, netflix and skype, product ad said it had it all, took a chance, came quick in the mail, opened them up and no problems so far, got on line quickly, went through all the apps they give you, and still downloading more, lots of room, little book that comes with it helps little, figured it out for myself of what it does, battery lasted long time, rotates completly around, good camera I think, skype works well, netflix works well, hooked up to pc no problem, youtube works great, games and facebook, working great so far, GPS was a plus, so far so good, for the money and a 10inch tablet, this is a good product here, in my opinion, giving these to my kids, want one for myself before they are all gone, I have two 8inch tablets now,( different brand), but, this flytouch tablet is a good one for what it does, to me, can't go wrong, the price was right.

Reviews.Title: Bad Idea
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "afwxchick"
Reviews.Content: I got this tablet not even a week ago, at first I LOVED it. NOW, GOOGLE anything doesn't work! Actually NOTHING internet supported works! I contacted Google because google play stopped working. The specialist told me this company DOES NOT HAVE A LICENSE and/or did NOT pass compatibility test required by Google. Basically he said that once the Google server realizes its not AUTHORIZED it shuts down connectivity. This will be going back tomorrow. BUYER BEWARE, DO NOT BE STUBBORN OR NAIVE LIKE I WAS, SAVE YOUR MONEY!Here is the email from GoogleGoogle Play Support Team googleplay-support@google.com10:38 PM (27 minutes ago)to meHi K*******,Thanks for calling Google today to ask about your issue with accessing Google Play. I'm always happy when I get to hear directly from our customers. If for any reason you need to contact us again, please feel free to reply directly to this email or visit our help center at:support.google.com/googleplayI reviewed your account and unfortunately right now, the Flytouch Tablet isn't supported for use with the Google Play Store app or with play.google.com, which is why you're getting an error on the Google Play website.I know this might be confusing, but not all devices running Android are licensed to use Google Play. This happens because manufacturers use the free Android software on their devices, but sometimes these devices don't pass Google's compatibility requirements to have the Google Play Store app installed. To help with this confusion, we've published a complete list of supported devices here:[...]To see if your device can become a supported device, to find out what your other options are for getting apps on your device, or if you have any questions or doubts, I recommend contacting the manufacturer of your device directly.Thanks in advance for your understanding; it's very frustrating for us when our users have problems with unsupported devices since we can't help any further. If you have any follow-up questions about supported devices, please let me know. Have an excellent day.Regards,M***The Google Play Support Team

Reviews.Title: Good, not Great
Reviews.Author: Kaleb Antonson "God Is In His Heaven, All Is ...
Reviews.Content: I bought this tablet for a few reasons, A) Iv been wanting a tablet for awhile and B) because my kindle keyboard recently broke. Iv never heard of the Brand FlyTouch, its apparently some Chinese knock off company, thats not to say the tablet is bad, its OK, it does feel plastic and cheap, but I only spent 120 dollars on it. people are saying that you have to push hard to make the keys work are mistaken, its not the keys that are hard to push, its the processor that takes along time to complete the action, it is a slow tablet, but at the end of the day I like it. It has alot of ports that other tablets just dont have and i like the fact that you can customize it. if you are looking for a cheap tablet, buy this.

Reviews.Title: What I expected and wanted from this tablet.
Reviews.Author: Abram Vargas
Reviews.Content: ok so let me start off by saying that if you want something that compares to and I-pad or Asus prime or any Top of the line tablet this is NOT the tablet for you. I mean come on people the price says it all.  You want a top of the line tablet pay the price of a top of the line tablet which for now is over 350 dollars depending on the tablet.  That said, It is everything it says it is.  It did come with a 4.0 android operating system and it does have the USB ports and WiFI.  It arrived on time.  I bought this tablet for my 13 year old Godson.  All he is going to do with this is to use Facebook, write Email, and play Plants vs Zombis and Angry birds and read books.  I tested this tablet for those purposes and it worked fine.  Now it that is all you want to do this tablet will work fine for you as well.  It is a bit slow but not so slow that you can say why did I buy this for.  I rated it a 5 star because it was exactly what it said it was.  I have no complaints but I knew it was not an OMG tablet.

Reviews.Title: Almost perfect
Reviews.Author: Eden Onyx
Reviews.Content: Like many I was skeptical. Let me give you honest feedback that you can count on. I actually give this product 3 1/2 stars but that wasn't an options.Pros:Tons of appsNice speedFair Download time2 USB ports (to connect keyboard and other items)A modem jack (to plug in your phone line if you don't have wifi)HDMI port (to connect to your tv so you can watch videos or netflix movies)Comes with a stylus (which improves the touchscreen quality)LOUD soundCons:The device is made of fragile material (get a case)Touch sensitivity is mild (use the stylus which comes WITH the device)Privacy screen (the screen appears blurred to someone who is standing a an angle trying to look over and see)Now WI-FI is great but sometimes you have to reconnect it, it takes like 1 minute or less to do. TIP: Go to the google play store (the app) and reinstall youtube. This is because the youtube installed on the device is outdated. Just telling you to save time.All in all, the good far outweighs the bad. This device is great, works well with tango, skype, etc. Most people are trying to compare this to an Ipad, you cannot compare apples and oranges. Plus, Ipads have huge drawbacks as well. Enjoy the product, it's a keeper.If you have a question about the product, I will answer it for it. Quite possibly with a video if I need to show you something.

Reviews.Title: Not bad for the price.
Reviews.Author: shaun
Reviews.Content: Nice product for the price. only bad thing is the user's guide not so helpfull. Very small book if you can even call it a book,and the print is very small. I found most info you need online.

Reviews.Title: Worst tablet on the market - don't buy
Reviews.Author: ms87
Reviews.Content: The tablet is a cheap plastic toy, with a bootleg android platform installed that is incompatible with the app store. The tablet is useless, and doesn't work. Worst part is you cannot get a refund and send it back.Don't be fooled by the reviews on here. If I could rate this product 0 stars I would.1. The battery does not last for longer than 45 minutes of usage.2. You cannot connect to a secured (password required) wifi network3. SD card slot will break apart (don't attempt to use it)4. You will have to push really hard on the screen to make the touch work5. The screen is plastic

Reviews.Title: inexpensive and works pretty good
Reviews.Author: mnp2192
Reviews.Content: After purchasing my Flytouch tablet I received it in about 3 days. Unpacked it and found that it was as described. It came with a screen protector, a stylus pen, a external gps, usb cable, earphones, and the tablet itself. I have charged it. Added some apps from the android market. Some I was able to add some not. Netflix works fine. Unlike my android phone you are not able to make the screen larger or smaller by touch. But for $120.00 not bad. I can surf the web. I can operate most of the apps I wanted. I love the input/output options and I think with a little tinkering I can get the other apps to download. This is not a Ipad. It is an inexpensive android tablet. If you want more than that, cough up the money.

Reviews.Title: FLYBOOK.
Reviews.Author: JDANNENBERG
Reviews.Content: I got it fairly quickly, although I paid extra for shipping. I loved it the first day I got it. I started downloading some apps and found that hardly any were compatible. Basically that it was too old of software to even have the newer facebook and twitter on there. That was very upsetting..

Reviews.Title: Very Dsappointing
Reviews.Author: Jason Bronx, NY
Reviews.Content: Brought this item brand new, and with in a week the screen messed up, with multiple lines going throught the middle of the screen. Don't buy this

Reviews.Title: A Value Tablet but Flytouch Website does not respond
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey I. Fox
Reviews.Content: I have had another small inexpensive tablet, and they all seem to have the same or similiar technology. If someone at these companies would take the time to make a thorough, easy to understand instruction book, the ratings and sales would be much higher, and the consumer would appreciate the product.  How about a tablet for "Dummies" book.  The only real issue with these products seems to be the powering on and off, which can be erratic at times.  The product quality and technology is decent, but I don't think the foreign countries that produce them can translate the instructions properly for the US market. They really have some great features, but the lack of instruction causes a lot of fustration. I have revised my review and have only given a one star reveiw because the Flytouch website does not respond to my emails. I sent two, and the first was sent over a week ago.  HDMI to tv connection does not work, and the same problem is indicated on several other Amazon reviews.  Also, the GPS device and function does not work.

Reviews.Title: Easy to Crack Screen!!!
Reviews.Author: Benjamin Chin
Reviews.Content: Screen cracked when I tried to apply the screen protector!  I was working the bubbles out of the screen protector that came with it, when it cracked!  The screen now no longer works!

Reviews.Title: Exactly what I expected!
Reviews.Author: Kim R
Reviews.Content: Before purchasing this product, I took the time to read each and every review. Many of the reviews were not very positive, but the few that were positive are what helped me decide to purchase this tablet. I was going to purchase a Kindle Fire or a Google Nexus, but really wanted something less expensive. The product arrived days earlier than the estimated arrival which was a pleasant surprise. It came fully charged, which was also a nice surprise! The instruction booklet that comes with the tablet is really not helpful - whoever translated it to English did not know English very well. However, I was still able to understand it enough to figure things out.  I had no problems connecting to WI-FI and so far, the connection has never dropped.  I was concerned about the Facebook app not working properly after all of the negative feedback, but even after updating it to the latest version I am pleased to say it is working wonderfully!  All the other apps have updated to the current versions and are also working just fine.  I have added several apps such as Scramble with Friends Free, Kindle, Netflix, and more and they have all worked as they should.  I also purchased a memory card and it is working great, too. I purchased this tablet with the intention of using it for email, games, searching the web, watching movies via Netflix, using Facebook and reading books with the Kindle app and it is perfect! Someday I will buy one of the name brands, but for now this is just what I wanted. :)UPDATE 9/17/2012: After having a week of no problems, I went to use this tablet this morning and it was dead. I used it the night before with no problems, I plugged it in to charge overnight and it was fine. Next morning it would not turn on and the light that shows it is charging won't even light up.  I have sent a request to the seller for a return. I will update once I hear back from the seller.  I am really sad, because I really liked this tablet and liked the price. :(

Reviews.Title: It does the job
Reviews.Author: Moreth
Reviews.Content: If you're expecting an Ipad you need to either read more closely or move along. This tablet is a great starter and does exactly what it's advertized to do. The features all work for me and it was up and going right out of the box. It's very user friendly as well as the ability to get tons of apps and I still have only run across one that any issues at all after downloading dozens. But just so we're clear it's not an Ipad, meaning you can use flash memory, two usb ports, very easy syncing, works as a easy and great video player for 1080p movies with nearly no setup time, and for the price I haven't seen an equivalent. I absolutely agree there are faster, more modern tablets on the market, however as the old saying goes "You get what you pay for.". I needed a low priced tablet that functions well and allows for ease of use and that's exactly what I got. I'm glad I took a chance on it.

Reviews.Title: tablet
Reviews.Author: bethany
Reviews.Content: the tablet is great the apps are horrible. you cant get any of the google apps you are used to from the play store on your phone. Example  facebook when you open it says use the android app for facebook. you click to download it and it states it is not compatibile with you device.  You can not down load facebook messenger  or any of the other messengers that you are use to using on your phone. It does not connect using a HDMI cable or a USB cable to my television. I can see videos from my phone or laptop on my tv, but nothing when I connect this device. I am glad it was so cheap other wise I would be upset.

Reviews.Title: its alright
Reviews.Author: jreed
Reviews.Content: A little laggy and too sensitive to touch.  You scroll on a given page and it clicks instead of scrolls.  Ap store may be android market but half you apps you are able to download on your phone wont work on this tablet.  For the money it is okay I guess if you buy and mouse and keyboard.  Cheaper than a netbook I guess.  battery not great either

Reviews.Title: IT's Better than you'd think!
Reviews.Author: Benjamin A. Berryhill "Benjamin A Berryhill"
Reviews.Content: I had no idea what to expect but, this little tablet does more than what you might think.  Love the access to the Droid Apps and everything is available to do and most are free!!!  Use it for time sheet application for work, film the before and after of the work and lets the boss know who's really working.  Video chat with the daycare about the kid.  get the shopping list to help the wife. Preorder at WallMart and just pickup the bulk items insted of "The Lomg Walk of WALLYWORLD".  Watch movies in private or plug in to flatscreen to share. The upgrade for this is another plus that Engine29 will do for you buy sending it back when they have the firmware.  GREAT AND A+++ service from the Engine29 is GREAT.

Reviews.Title: 10" google android tablet
Reviews.Author: Nigel
Reviews.Content: I recently bought one of your tablets for my wife. It has turned out to be a very bad investment. First of all, the second night I had it I was trying to put a micro sd card in the section made for that purpose but the card went inside of the tablet itself. Now I can hear my 16 GB sd card shaking inside the tablet. Please note, the tablet never fell or was never misused in anyway. Secondly, I tried to install the facebook app for android and I got a message that it could not be installed on the device. Thirdly, several of the apps that I installed eventually just stopped working. Fourthly, the tablet turns off constantly by itself and usually in the middle of my wife working on it. Fifthly, the auto rotate does not work.

Reviews.Title: Its a crap
Reviews.Author: juan cavero
Reviews.Content: This tablet is a piece of crap. First I had to replace 3 chargers for malfunction . Now the tablet is dead I can t turn it on. Horrible...!!!

Reviews.Title: Android tablet
Reviews.Author: marijean t lombardi
Reviews.Content: I can not get it fixed.  I used it for the first time on line and left it on a certain website  and when I came back to it the screen was all white .  I have had it for less than a year. I keep going back and forth with seller and can get no satisfaction.  I am even willing to pay-  even though, it should have some kind of guarantee.  Personally, I will not buy anything from Amazon again.  I may have to just get another tablet.  I am very spset about the whole situation.  The seller is not helping me at all. Seller does not  answer phone calls from me.

Reviews.Title: this product sucks!!
Reviews.Author: Kelly Helsel
Reviews.Content: you get what what you pay for. you want cheap you get cheap with this product. i used it for litteraly 2 months before it didnt work any more it is now in the dump yard where it belongs. They dump has more use for this tablet then i ever got out of it.  its hard to download and it just plain old sucks!!! oh did i mention it sucks? well it does!

Reviews.Title: Faulty Product
Reviews.Author: James D. Harris, Jr.
Reviews.Content: Product did not work as advertised... very, very disappointed.  I was not able to use it at all.  Wish that I could get my money back!

Reviews.Title: Tablet
Reviews.Author: Lesly
Reviews.Content: I am in love with this tablet. It's really great for school and it's really fast. I had other tablets that didn't work and they ran really slow.

Reviews.Title: Flytouch 10" VC882 EPAD Tablet.
Reviews.Author: HJPears
Reviews.Content: I have purchased 2 of these now and they are great. There are plenty of free apps to download, and an easy to use desktop. Just remember it is not an IpAD, but it is also not $600 or $700 dollars. The only issues I can report are that the Stylus included in the case of the laptop scratches the screen protector because it is sharp. (Use one of the rubber tipped ones that you can buy seperately.) The second issue is the Power supply tip is very small and sometimes does not connect enough to keep power to the tablet if you move it around. (Look and see if the charging power light is on) The Tablet shipped very quickly, and is reasonable priced. I added a 16GB micro SD card, which is plenty of storage for what I use the tablet for.

Reviews.Title: tablet had issues but company great to work with
Reviews.Author: hsbmom
Reviews.Content: My tablet had lots of issues, slow response, couldn't scroll on internet pages, system finally permanently froze but I can't say enough about the  company. They were great to work with and very responsive.  Returned my money in full with out any hastle.

Reviews.Title: Nice unit, needs some tech support and instructions.
Reviews.Author: Rocket
Reviews.Content: Nice toy to play with. Great price!  Android 4.0 (ICS), 4Gb. Google market works great.Netflix is not preloaded, you have to get it from google Play. Netlfix doesn't work like it should... everything is in 4:3 for streaming to this device.  I could use some help figuing this out. Netflix is also gives me sound but no video.  I have to uninstall and reinstall go get it to work right. If I can fix it, I'll update this post. It may be that the correct codecs are not loaded with this unit from the seller/factory. if it does not work, i will return the unit if possible...Still, good system response, wifi and surfing. If you want to see the 'regular' web pages vs mobi versions, click the three dots in the top right and select 'Request desktop site' when needed.

Reviews.Title: Very poor product
Reviews.Author: A. Nadir "Tree Hugger"
Reviews.Content: First time round, got this tablet with the window cracked and shattered. Returned it and asked for a replacement.  Second time, round, the LED light socket and the power port connectivity is damaged, it doesn't charge more than 10%.Overall, semi-decent product.  The screen size is decent.  The touch-tone capability is very week.  You practically have to pres VERY hard for a key stroke to be registered. The web browser is not the most appealing, looks archaic.I don't recommend this brand based on my experience.

Reviews.Title: Stopped working/ horrible
Reviews.Author: Sandra Brown
Reviews.Content: I purchased and have had to replace the charger several times. Doesn't turn on now can't get it to charge passed my return period imagine that. Wouldn't recommend it to anyone else.

Reviews.Title: Chinese piece of crap
Reviews.Author: Ann G. Chow "soloangel"
Reviews.Content: It arrived in a poorly packaged foam container. The box was not shrink wrapped and easy to see was NOT new. The shipping tag was from a PO box in Hongkong and the tag stated it was a gift worth $15. The device opened only long enough for me to input my personal information. Then it would not open again. When contacted, the sellar (under the guise of Amazon) told me to send it back...but all my personal information is in it. When I advised them of this, they said they were a Chinese company and would not use my personal information--REALLY? Don't buy any electronic items from Amazon.com especially if they come from China. If you run into a problem--Amazon could care less, and they will do nothing to help you. will do nothing to help you.

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: Cirri Evans
Reviews.Content: I am really pleased with the whole thing! I love this tablet and it works great. It meets more than what I had expected. Plus the price was unbeatable.

Reviews.Title: Junk
Reviews.Author: Lynn
Reviews.Content: This item shipped faulty and when contacting customer and tech service, I had numerous people telling me to do the exact same thing. I highly recommend spending a few dollars more and not having the hassle of dealing with this level of incompetnce and terrible customer service.

Reviews.Title: GOOGLE ANDROID
Reviews.Author: IMMIE MCDONALDJ
Reviews.Content: THIS PRODUCT INITIALLY WORKED OK. AFTER TURNING IT OFF AND ON SEVERAL TIMES I COULD NOT GET IT TO REACTIVATE.RETURNED FOR FULL REFUND.

Reviews.Title: HELP!
Reviews.Author: CC
Reviews.Content: I bought this with no doubts. Now I've had it for about 3 weeks and it will turn on but is stuck on the android logo. I do not want to regret spending $130 on something that will not work. I don't know if anyone can reply to me but if you can i would really appreciate if anyone could help me getting my tablet working again! I have tried many things charging it over night,pressing the reset button,etc.. I am getting quite frustrated. I saw where I can not return this item so if anyone can help me PLEASE do I need help fast! Thanks :)

Reviews.Title: Everything as advertised.
Reviews.Author: John M
Reviews.Content: Now please understand that this is a budget device... but for a budget device it goes a long way.  First off, the large 10.1" screen is phenomenal, providing a beautiful picture.  The response from it is a little slow to respond, but for the $100 price tag, there is absolutely nothing to complain about.  The android OS runs without a hitch, and angry birds will run at almost perfect speed (if you don't own a top tier phone or tablet, you might not even know the difference).  The advertised disk storage is not the actual size of the hard disk but the amount available.  Music playback is more than acceptable, and Netflix looks spectacular.  The product as advertised easily gets an A+.As compared to a $400 tablet, the product may not be as fantastic... but having bought this simply to be able to read through my coding references while typing, I am twice as satisfied as expected.  And as a final note about the seller:  Having run out of the EXACT product I had purchased, the used 4GB, they sent me a new 6GB.  Kudos!

Reviews.Title: don't buy this tablet it is not good
Reviews.Author: mary gopaul
Reviews.Content: this tablet is no good i am so sorry that i brought this it is not working good at all n 2 top it off i can not do anything about it

Reviews.Title: Many touch screen issues
Reviews.Author: Duane O.
Reviews.Content: Had many issues with touch screen, tech support was so-so, and couldn't resolve the issue, so we returned it. took a long time to get credit for this return.

Reviews.Title: Broke after 2 months
Reviews.Author: Jolean Thomas
Reviews.Content: Product stopped charging after 2 months, assumed it was the charger so ordered a new Android Tablet charger still doesn't work.  No help from the seller either, I know it has been several months but the seller was of absolutely no help at all.

Reviews.Title: Very low quality
Reviews.Author: HTD
Reviews.Content: The tablet feels very cheap, the home button sticks, everything is plastic and pieces don't fit together well.  It constantly crashes, you can't even play angry birds on it.  The touch screen is not capacitive so you have to really press on the icons to open an application and even then its not a smooth process.  The battery lasts 1 hour max from a full charge, even if you kill every task running.  I bought this for my 6 year old son and he realized right away that it is a cheap imitation of a good tablet.  This was a waste of money, please don't buy this, spend more money and get something you will actually be able to use.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: tiffany reed
Reviews.Content: the screen is so much bigger than my 7 inch and i love it it will work out great for my grandparents...yay i can get my lap top back from them! thank you so much

Reviews.Title: LOve it-Awesome
Reviews.Author: melissa
Reviews.Content: I got this for my daughter, she is 15 and starting with technology so I did not want to get something really expensive. All I can say this is just as good as the Apple IPAD if not better. The only thing that has been difficult is getting ITUNES loaded into it because it is an Android, but you can do it, just takes a bit of patience. Awesome EPAD does everything and I just ordered the keyboard as well from amazon for dirt cheap and it is a perfect pair. I love playing around with this that I am thinking of buying another. Our niece has the Apple IPAD and seriously same exact things can be done at a lower price. So reccommend this item

Reviews.Title: Fairly Good
Reviews.Author: Lydia
Reviews.Content: I found the product to be OK not the greatest.  Internet connects to my WIFI great.  But some of the apps don't work that great. The camera is not that good.  Pictures are of a very poor quality. Besides it is OK. Netflix loads find.

Reviews.Title: Not Bad for the Price
Reviews.Author: Lizzy
Reviews.Content: It's not the greatest tablet, but what can you expect for the price.  I bought it for the purpose of making photo albums to share. I had a couple of problems where my pictures keep duplicating & I had to go in to delete them (I think that was finally resolved) & I haven't found an app I really like for my albums yet, but for that I just need to keep looking.  Anyway the rest of the apps I've tried work fine.

Reviews.Title: Not what I thought it was.
Reviews.Author: Mikeh
Reviews.Content: This device is ok I gurss. It will not even keep the right date. Today is 8-31 and it keeps 9-1. Well I guess thats the way it is. Since I do not like to return items I guess I can use it for a paper wieght or something. Will get me an ipad that I know works when I can afford one. Thanks for Steve Jobs. Will stick with Apple and Windows products. Will not even let me sign in to my gmail account. Keeps telling me security problems or something. So I keep rsetting password and stuff and keep getting the same thing. Just be careful with what you all buy. I know it is not Amazons fault everything I have gotten there is a really good product. But not this thing.

Reviews.Title: Worth the money
Reviews.Author: tnforte
Reviews.Content: I received the product in excellent condition. The product works great. I bought this for my child, and it is perfect for that purpose. However, if I was buying for myself, I would definitely spend the money to get a name brand, better quality on display for use of sykpe and apps. This machine is limited to the apps you can download. It is not top of the line for sure. With that being said, you can use it for books, email, games, etc. So, it is worth the save if your use is for things other than making videos and communicating via the video capability.

Reviews.Title: 18+ months later still works well
Reviews.Author: GA
Reviews.Content: Although this is not perfect I feel that I have gotten my monies worth for this item.  I have used this for my business, studying using Kindle works fine.

Reviews.Title: No Power
Reviews.Author: Mike Bishop
Reviews.Content: The tablet worked well for about the first month. Then it quit charging. I was able to get another charger and it worked for about a week and then quit. Now the tablet will not charge at all. Might as well use it as a frizbe.

Reviews.Title: Horrible Product
Reviews.Author: Chris Pittman
Reviews.Content: Do not buy this product no matter what.  I bought it for my mother because she wanted a tablet.  She had it less than three months before it started messing up.  We called the company and they didn't do anything at all to help her out.  Horrible product.

Reviews.Title: Unacceptable Tablet Performance
Reviews.Author: choose_wisely7
Reviews.Content: Do not buy. I received as a gift and it's not the gifter's fault. They read some good reviews. However, this tablet does NOT: auto rotate properly (setting was checked), stay connected to WiFi, respond well to selections made, have a readable screen, and sync accounts properly. One cannot make any important transactions on the web because the WiFi connection continues to fade in and out. That is the ultimate deal breaker for me. In addition, it cuts the hell off when I am in the middle of something, anything!! And then it will sit on the "android screen"  for an unlimited amount of time. It's pretty useless when you're unable to the things you need to. I am so annoyed!I have contacted the help desk group for this product and they are NOT helpful. I was given specific instructions to go flash the tablet at a website that I have never heard of-- and I was suppose to remove the SD card (did not come with one), and place it in the computer and then flash the tablet to reset it. What? I got a card, but since there is nothing on it, that is pointless.This device is also not approved through Google and therefore has limited compability. Save for an IPAD,,, at least there is quality and a warranty.

Reviews.Title: Let me make this brief: Garbage
Reviews.Author: Mark Wedell
Reviews.Content: My daughter received one of these as a Christmas gift, and has been distraught ever since, because this tablet fails on a daily basis. One by one the apps and basic functions fail. What a shame. Poor kid.....

Reviews.Title: Flytouch 10.1
Reviews.Author: Winsome L. Passmore
Reviews.Content: I bought two of these tablets - one  for a gift and the other for myself in DecemberAfter  much trial and errors (we had to calibrate them) we got it to work.Now  the one that I gave  as  gift - is  frozen - we have tried everythng.  the reset  button and calibration and nothing happens.I regret  buying them,  I lost  my  $135.00 sending it  back.  I hope they can fix it

Reviews.Title: totally awful
Reviews.Author: cristian gonzalez
Reviews.Content: cheap and seemingly used hardware specified new i bought 2 one is already garbage it makes ipad look like a window to heaven the long title should have been 10" IF IT CAN GET TO GOOGLE AND NOT CRASH USING ANDROID 4.0 MUDTOUCH .THE SCREEN NEEDS THE BONUS PEN TO BE SOMEWHAT USABLE DOESN'T PLAY HARDLY ANY FORMAT VIDEO WITHOUT CRASHING THIS IS A POS

Reviews.Title: good product
Reviews.Author: jessica m marko
Reviews.Content: my 17 year old seems to love it  thanks i hope it doesnt have problems in the future crossing my fingers

Reviews.Title: Not what I expected.

Reviews.Title: Bought it early for Christmas gift

Reviews.Content: Bought it early for a Christmas gift my kid opened it and the screen was seperating from the housing fixed it with super gluewi-fi turns of and onturns off sometimes when remove chargertouch screen poor performanceover all cheap piece of garbagewill spend extra money on nexus

Reviews.Content: I bought 2 of yhesr tablets thinking they wood be good but from the moment they arrived it was a horrrible the screen keeps flickering on 1 and niether want to fully charge

Reviews.Title: hugely disappointed
Reviews.Author: pengill
Reviews.Content: Purchased for my daughter and her family, found.it interesting that it wad titled Google Android when it did recognize any of the Google of Android programs.  After less than a week the tablet was barely functioning.  We returned for a refund.  Hugely disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Google Tablet
Reviews.Author: LoAnn
Reviews.Content: I think that the tablet may be a good product if I could get it on line.  Have contacted the customer service dept from which I bought it and they said they would get back to me, in the order in which they get the emails.  It has been weeks now and still no contact.  I also contacted their phone only to be told the number could not go through as to an overload in the voice mail box. This tells me they are not responding to customer and that I will NEVER buy another product from them.  I have gone on line looking for the answers and find I am no the only person having connectivity issues.

Reviews.Title: The Worst tablet EVER created
Reviews.Author: Flytouch Hater
Reviews.Content: 1) The touch screen is terrible-in order to get it to respond, prepare to almost break your fingers2) The tablet is junk-at first it was the best Christmas gift ever, but then the google play store stopped working. We got it fixed, but then after less than a week, it said that about half of the apps I had installed weren't installed while the other half "Unfortunately stopped working".3) The charger is cheap and breaks very easily.4) Sometimes, you have to delete stuff like certain music or apps because they either won't turn on or won't play.5) If I were you, I'd get a Nexus tablet or an Ipad for all you Apple lovers.

Reviews.Title: Defective

Reviews.Content: Had nothing but problems with this tablet.Screen frooze, google play would not load, apps would vanish, volume would not turn up. Yoo many problems to remember. I have sent it back for a replace and hope the problems was just this one tablet.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Genner godoy
Reviews.Content: Excellent product, I love it when I saw it .. I worked well very grateful for this product to my children and I love, excellent.!!THANKS!

Reviews.Title: Google android
Reviews.Author: Colleen A. Beair "colleen"
Reviews.Content: Meet all my expectations does everything i wanted and more.great price love it so many apps i spend hours on it thank you for the good product

Reviews.Title: This is a totally awesome tablet !
Reviews.Author: Herman Simpson
Reviews.Content: I received my tablet after being a week late,but it was well worth the xtra time.I bought the upgrade to touch screen and 8g.As soon as i turned it on (came fully charged) I connected quickly with my wireless router.I was skeptical after reading all the bad writeups in here,but ordered anyway.I'm so glad I did because the picture quality is much better than my wifes ipad.I strongly recommend the seller and the tablet.I'm ordering two more one for myself and one for my sister.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Fabian Vilalba "Fabian E Villalba"
Reviews.Content: Great for its price. Unlike other posts that mention this tablet, it has not broken or faulted in the slightest. I do recommend you get a screen protector though .

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: gisselle
Reviews.Content: I'm in love with my tablet and also u can afford this.my family are in love with this , u can download your apps easily.

Reviews.Title: great but
Reviews.Author: plp
Reviews.Content: I really liked this tablet, as it is more affordable than those name brands.  Now I know why. After only 2 months it no longer holds a charge. And now I can't even exchange it. Well that only goes to show you.... you only get what you pay for.

Reviews.Title: Great for kids to play games
Reviews.Author: Stacy - MN
Reviews.Content: I purchased this tablet to try it out for a Christmas gift foy my boys, now I want to purchase another one for my other son.  Easy to download games from play store app, battery lasts quiet awhile.  Didn't realize the camera is on the front side but, for my kids it doesn't matter they love it!  It's better than a PSP, DSI or any other gadget.  Money well spent, fast shipping as well.

Reviews.Title: WORKED FOR 3MONTHS ONLY!!
Reviews.Author: Chrissy
Reviews.Content: I had this item for 3months, it worked fine until last night the 23/November/2012 i tried putting it on and it freezes on the android loading screen..does any one else have this issue ? i need help please 10" GOOGLE ANDROID 4.0 TABLET 4GB FLYTOUCH 10.1 VC882 EPAD LAPTOP WIFI CAMERA HDMI Support External 3G, Flash 10.1 Cortex A8,WIFI, HDMI, Skype Video Calling &Netflix; Movies

Reviews.Title: Dont waste
Reviews.Author: Not Bad But Not Good Either!
Reviews.Content: I truely hate that I spent my money on this product and it sucksz..It was okayy for two weeks but then it started turning off by it self losing charge easily started freezing had to reset more than twice. Charger stopped working after three weeks and it gets hot really fast.... Reallyy irritated that I wasted my money.

Reviews.Title: horrible. if i could do negative stars i would
Reviews.Author: Ashley Remeika
Reviews.Content: horrible. looked nothing like the photo, had a completely different name on the box, came in an unwrapped package, felt fake, we returned it the day we recieved it.

Reviews.Title: clunky touch screen
Reviews.Author: brage
Reviews.Content: the title says it all. the poor touch screen response over shadows all it's other good points. If it had a better response to the touch screen it would be a great buy.

Reviews.Title: Google Android Tablet
Reviews.Author: Paul Carney
Reviews.Content: This serves the purpose for exactly what I needed - internet access, the ability to use it for powerpoint presentations, and as an 'ereader' for Kindle and B&N.;

Reviews.Title: Tablet Glitters But Not Gold
Reviews.Author: Techwise
Reviews.Content: This Tablet seemed very nice at first with all the cool compatible apps that would work on it like Netflix, YouTube, Firefox, Skype, Facebook, Yahoo, MSN, Gmail, Pandora Radio and more.. . . But it soon became apparent that the processor might be getting a little overloaded when it started freezing and crashing over and over again on certain java based Websites that don't cause other tablets to crash, very annoying to say the least.Strange enough the Google Chrome browser makes it crash more often when installed, so I would avoid installing Chrome on it ever and some popular apps turned out to be incompatible with this system like: WhatsAp, and Viber and Lingo.The unit I purchased had very bad Mic input reception. When using Skype no one could hear me clearly. Also tested it with the Sound Recorder App and it could barely record my voice even when I yelled at it. I don't know if this is a general problem on all the units, I would think I just simply had a faulty Mic on the one I was sent.I eventually returned the Tablet for a refund. Otherwise it ran games okay like Angry Birds and Temple Run and was very nice in other ways but I did not like the way it crashed sometimes or suddenly reset and restarted itself without warning. It does not come with a GPS either.Your choice if you only need to do some light browsing, play a few fun games and read your e-mail.

Reviews.Title: HAPPINESS TURNS TO DISMAY: DON'T BUY THIS TABLET!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Happy Camper
Reviews.Content: I wanted an affordable tablet to use for games, email, Facebook, and online shopping...and the Google Flytouch fits the bill. I found the touchscreen to be a bit of a challenge, which was easily fixed with an inexspensive keyboard and stylus that came with a cover and built-in stand (also ordered from Amazon). So now I'm a Happy Camper!  EXCEPT....!!!!!!  I THEN BOUGHT ONE FOR MY SISTER FOR CHRISTMAS, & IT'S BEEN NOTHING BUT TROUBLE!!!!!!! IT WON'THOLD A CHARGE, APPS DON'T RESPOND, & IT TURNS ITSELF ON &  OFF &  IN  GENERAL DOES NOT RESPOND...TECH SUPPORT WAS INITIALLY HELPFUL & IS NOW NON -EXISTENT!  I ended up buying myself  a new charger, & I use the browser to get to my internet apps & email...I'll keep it because I can do what I need  with it & can't afford anything else... But my sister's needs to be returned for a refund AND I THOROUGHLY DREAD WHAT PROMISES TO BE AN  EXERCISE IN FUTILITY!!!!! STAY AWAY FROM THIS PRODUCT. AND engine/29

Reviews.Title: So Far so GOOD...
Reviews.Author: CollegeStudent3700
Reviews.Content: I have had my tablet for about a week now and so far I have no complaints. It is very easy to you and the android market makes things a lot more convenient and easier to use. I purchased the tablet so my seven year old son could play games and so that I could do homework from my student portal and I have been able to do all of the above...

Reviews.Title: disappointed
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: You know the saying; you get what you pay for. Cheap piece of junk. The worst part is the first one that was sent to me didn't even work so returned and exchanged which took Weeks and the new one has problems also. Not worth the headache of going through the return process again. Chocked up as a loss and tossed in the closet with other useless items

Reviews.Title: SLOW
Reviews.Author: amanda
Reviews.Content: It runs real slow. Sometimes it turns on and sometimes it just doesn't and the battery life sucks a**!!! It only lasts an hour. Maybe two depending on what I'm doing!!!!!

Reviews.Title: google pad
Reviews.Author: joeyfanof88
Reviews.Content: Very good product. I have read where some people have had trouble with it turning off or freezing up. I have had this product for a month and have had none of the problems at all. I use it everyday and I just bought another one for my wife.

Reviews.Title: Junk tablets
Reviews.Author: d.davis
Reviews.Content: Chargers were defective, and after buying new chargers for the tablets, they will not work with the wifi. These are not worth buying. I ended up going and buying new tablets to give to my grand children at a local market.

Reviews.Title: I word Buy Another One it is a nice pad
Reviews.Author: stevenray0
Reviews.Content: I word Buy Another One it is a nice pad it got me a way from my Desk PC it whent every where with me

Reviews.Title: 10" Google Flytouch Android 4.0 Tablet
Reviews.Author: Mincks 2
Reviews.Content: This was a great price, and the product works adequately.  However, I've had trouble with the screen freezing VERY often.  I finally reformatted it, losing everthing on it, and then re-loaded everything.  I still have trouble, but not as often.  I have to reboot it about once an hour.  I'm reasonably happy, because I don't use it much, and couldn't afford a better product.  This one is adequate.

Reviews.Title: sine pboblems, but these have been resolved
Reviews.Author: joy
Reviews.Content: When I first received the tablet, it worked fine.  Product info guide is terrible.  After a few days of playing a great game, I could not get the tablet to charge so I called tech service.  We thought that the power cord was defective so I took it to Best Buy to test it.  It tested OK.  So after a couple of days I tried to use the power charger and lo and behold it worked.  Everything has been fine since.  I really like the tablet and hope it doesn't act up again.

Reviews.Title: Bad bad bad
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: You get what you pay for.  After just 2 weeks of use this tablet was freezing up and spontaniously rebooting.  Yesterday the left side of the screen stopped working and now I noticed that there is a crack in the screen.  The screen itself feels cheap to the touch.  Don't buy this!!

Reviews.Title: flytouch
Reviews.Author: craig on amazon
Reviews.Content: So ee got the flytouch the other day, easy to set up, the only complaint has to do with the power supply cord. Of all the connectors out there, the picked the flimsiest one of the bunch. It is small, and has already broke. A better solution would be to used the standard usb connection like on an Android phone. Oh, and it is not. Standard power converter, so no Walmart replacement..

Reviews.Title: 10'' Google Android 4.0 Flytouch
Reviews.Author: Progers
Reviews.Content: The tablet is slow and the screen does not respond to hand touching and hardly to the stylist.  Has contact to all the apps and the connections work well. The camera produces nice pics.

Reviews.Title: DONT WASTE YOUR MONEY
Reviews.Author: Brandon
Reviews.Content: I gave this 1 star because it made me! This item lags, Wireless works SOMETIMES the touch screen stops responding until you turn it off and back on. It freezes. This is NOT worth my money. I will be sending back Monday morning and saving my money for an iPad! LESSON LEARNED!

Reviews.Title: does pretty much everything and speed isn't bad
Reviews.Author: lou42527
Reviews.Content: I bought this tablet for my mom who had no computer and no computer skills so I didn't need something awesome, but this is pretty damn good so far.  video loads quickly, netflix and youtube apps work great and for a resistive touch screen, this must be top of the line resistive because it almost doesn't feel resistive.  There is a big however though.  I found that it didn't work at all like it should have when it first came.  screen wasn't that responsive and video didn't work most of the time.  What I needed to do was to go to settings and select backup and restore and do a complete system restore.  Then I just needed to go to google market and download the netflix and youtube apps.  Now it works great.  Definitely a great tablet for the price.  UPDATEIN JUST A LITTLE MORE THAN A MONTH, THE TABLET STOPPED BEING ABLE TO BOOT UP AND WHEN YOU TURN IT ON, IT GETS STUCK ON THE ANDROID TITLE PAGE AND WILL NOT GET PASSED THAT.  IT STAYS ON ANDROID FOR HOURS UNTIL THE BATTERY RUNS OUT.  ENGINE 29 IS BEING GOOD ABOUT EXCHANGING IT EVEN THOUGH IT HAS BEEN MORE THAN A MONTH.  I LOOKED FURTHER AND FOUND ANOTHER REVIEW THAT SAID THEY HAD THE SAME PROBLEM.  JUST GO FOR A BETTER TABLET AND FOR ABOUT $50 MORE, THERE ARE MUCH BETTER TABLETS OUT THERE.

Reviews.Title: Good tablet for the price.
Reviews.Author: Jessica F.
Reviews.Content: Had been wanting a tablet for awhile but didn't want buy an expensive tablet since I have a younger child. Found this product for the right price. Have had no problem with WIFI. Apps download without any problems. Will say that some of the apps are not compatabile with this tablet-especially facebook. Netflix works good. Front facing camera takes decent pictures. Screen can be a little touchy when looking through apps store. Has a lot of different ports. Overall happy with what I got for the price I paid.

Reviews.Title: Facebook?  Really?
Reviews.Author: Not Happy
Reviews.Content: I am a big facebooker, I like the games and all my people on there.  I was pretty happy to see it was fb compatible, until I get the tab, and it is not compatible, you get to run the mobile version only.  That means, no games.. And if you try to browse with the browser to facebook, it still give you mobile only.I bought 2, and one gets really hot, within minutes, and doesnt seem to hold a charge, even with screen brightness turned all the way down.  There is alot of apps that i love and downloaded and had no success running those apps.  Many crash, or just dont run correctly, or force close.  Yeah not a fun time.So if you love facebook dont buy this tablet. End of story.

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet
Reviews.Author: J. Brandon
Reviews.Content: Bought This Tablet For My Godson And He Loves It. the tablet is very quick and has many great uses

Reviews.Title: Garbage.
Reviews.Author: E. J. Smith
Reviews.Content: I bought this product as a gift for my son.  In a nutshell, it's garbage. The touch screen doesn't work, the graphics quality is poor.  It's poorly manufactured. Avoid.

Reviews.Title: JUNK
Reviews.Author: Justpchy "Justpchy"
Reviews.Content: Opened the box excited.  NOT.  I had to pound on the keys to get them to work.  Not good at all.

Reviews.Title: update 05/17/2013, ZERO STARS !!!
Reviews.Author: New
Reviews.Content: Update 05/17/2013Tablet is dead within less than 10 months, can't charge no power, no response. Seller Engine 29 said it will fix it, but for a fee, no warranty nothing. Amazon is also useless they can't control their sellers, so buy this tablet if you want to use it for only 10 months and this is if you are lucky as per Engine 29 they will do something within the first 30 days and this is because Amazon guaranty this. Total rip off. There must be something wrong with the unit that I've received. It does not hold on to the wifi. I had hard time until finally I was able to connect thru wifi and seller must be well aware about the problem as they ship a flyer with the tablet explaining how to connect to your wifi. It's more complicated than you can imagine  but now I have even a bigger problem as this tablet does not maintain the connection.I had to turn it on then had to switch on, off the wifi switch in the settings menu before it finds the wifi network but then it stays on for few minutes and turns wifi off showing that network is "out of range" no matter I'm only few feet from the router.I can leave with the slow, unresponsive and not a multi-touch screen but without WIFI this is useless.

Reviews.Title: Do not purchase!
Reviews.Author: Aelyweeks
Reviews.Content: After testing it about 1 week, we thought it was decent for the price.  I would have given it about 3 stars originally but here's why i gave 1 star, and suggest to buy something else.Angry birds and a few other apps were preinstalled, which is nice. The item is refurbished and not new. Although the system was programmed in english, someone was previously using chinese web browser on there, so when opened, it would always be in Mandarin.  A lot of the apps were out dated and had to be re-downloaded, but we had problems with compatibility.  The touch screen, even after synced, was not very good and would often open things other than what you would press.  And finally, the reason for giving it the worst rating is that after 1.5 weeks of using, it inexplicably died!!  It will not restart or anything.  Currently trying to return this product. Buyers beware!

Reviews.Title: Not as expected
Reviews.Author: Lisa France-McElmurry
Reviews.Content: This is okay for the price, the screen is poor quality and is not set into product very well. I have had to "hard reset" it a couple of times. I would say to save up and buy an ipad or buy one now with the pay later option. Wish I wouldn't have wasted my time or money on this product.

Reviews.Title: JUST DONT
Reviews.Author: LUIS MONTANO "Luis Montano"
Reviews.Content: THE SHIPPER AND THIS TABLET SHOULD BE BANNED FROM AMAZON THEY JUST DID NOT CARE TO FIX MY PROBLEMS AND THE TABLE DID NOT DO ANY OF THE THINGS IT SAID WHEN I ORDER IT

Reviews.Title: horrible. save your money.
Reviews.Author: lizzard
Reviews.Content: I was thinking I wanted a tablet and this one was fairly inexpensive for a tablet. So why not. Well should have gone with my instinct. Everytime I've gotten on the tablet no.matter what I'm doing the screen will freeze. Then there is also a slow reaction time and games can't be played to full capacity. The internet at my house is wireless and I can be watching Netflix on my computer but on the tablet the internet goes on and off all the time interrupting what your doing. Save your money and buy a tablet worth your money.

Reviews.Title: Its good for the money (have had it and played for a week now)

I am still looking because there are people who have said that it can be done. Any input would be greatly appreciated. I like the size, like the color and view its kinda slow to reset screen orientation when its repositioned. And there are some things  that it just won't let you flip it on.  Over all its ok for the price.

Reviews.Title: Crap.....

Reviews.Content: This Tablet lasted for a month. ..would not hold a charge. .brought a new charger it still didn't work. ...I giving it one star an that's for the look..never got a chance to enjoy it. ..

Reviews.Title: ANDROID

Reviews.Content: Purchased two tablets for grand daughters.  They are in good condition and easy to use, recommend read other reviews before purchasing.

Reviews.Title: DO NOT BUY!!!

Reviews.Content: This was junk from the day I got it. When I first turned it on it froze and then after I shut it off to restart it I could never get it to come back on. Please do not waste your money on this....

Reviews.Title: affordable

Reviews.Content: it offers basic functions, but we had a real hard time downloading items from the internet, and the battery loses its charge very fast

Reviews.Title: i dont like it
Reviews.Author: Trammell
Reviews.Content: I haven't had it a whole year and it will not hold a charge ..I don't like it. . .

Reviews.Title: happy with service.
Reviews.Author: Anthony L.Peters
Reviews.Content: everything was great with my service.  Will oder form them again.. my tablet is doing great and so happy with it.

Reviews.Title: Like it

Reviews.Content: Bought it for myself but ended up giving it to my granddaughter- seems about right for her. My hubby bought me an IPAD.

Reviews.Title: Nope!
Reviews.Author: Angela E
Reviews.Content: Did not work like we had hoped, we had to replace the charger and have it sent in to be fixed. :/

Reviews.Title: It is okay.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: The video is a bit dark. Needed to attach speakers. My great grand likes using it to play toddler games.

Reviews.Title: Absolute Junk
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth
Reviews.Content: I purchased 3 of these for our children and within the 1st week 2 of them crapped out completely so we very quickly returned the 3rd one and was approved a full refund.  Returned the device with all of the acc. it came with and in all of the original packaging and they would not issue the credit.  Amazon is unwilling to help because it was past the A to Z return even though we have proof this took place within the time frame.  The other two devices sit here collecting dust the seller would never contact us or Amazon to deal with these "DOA" devices.  Now we are being told that neither seller can even be located by Amazon and I have email and chat session logs that date beck to the purchase.  BE CAREFUL WHEN PURCHASING!!!  We saved to get these for the kids and what a disaster the whole experience has been.  Really disappointed that Amazon wasn't more responsive earlier on instead of telling us we have to deal with the seller and then when that was a lost cause they told us our return window was up.

Reviews.Title: Item was okay but not overly satisfactory!
Reviews.Author: S A.
Reviews.Content: There were many times in use when the tablet would freeze-up on me and there were times that streaming in videos was stagnant.

Reviews.Title: 10" Google Android - "Awsome"
Reviews.Author: Mark
Reviews.Content: I am extremely pleased with the 10"Google Android and the price was best I found on the Internet.I expect to show it off to family and friends.Thank You!!!Mark

Reviews.Title: disappointment
Reviews.Author: sharavia
Reviews.Content: i cried.with the damage to tthe screen and the lagging and the freezing.I am highly disgusted with this purchase. It shuts off and restarts in the middle of everything. There is visible damage and i feel like i was tooken advantage of. If i could have sent it back i would in a heartbeat.its still packed in the box. It was a waste if my money and i dont use the damned thing. I will not be making any further purchases.if i could i wouldnt give it any stars but apparently i have to.

Reviews.Title: Great

Reviews.Content: Gave this as a gift, they love it, and it was simple and easy to use. A great buy. Thanks

Reviews.Title: item didn't even last a year

The light indicating that it is charging no longer comes on. I would think a tablet would last longer than a year without going bad.

Reviews.Title: love

Reviews.Content: This tablet is fantastic!!!  For me, it is just as good as a ipad!  I am capable of doing anything on it that I can do on a desk top computer!!!

Reviews.Title: Bad Choice
Reviews.Author: kim m. haley
Reviews.Content: Hard to use -  Instructions aren't any help.  Used it just a few times, now it won't even turn on.  Would not recommend.

Reviews.Title: stop working fast!!!!
Reviews.Author: kryz
Reviews.Content: i bought this item last year, in the beginning it was working correctly, i gift it to a kid, but in less than a month it stop working, i tried to get the part that did not work but they do not sell it. amazon gives a warranty of a month, and because i did not know that it was not working this warranty was expired, when i send a email to get the part, they told me that if i want to get it fixed i have to pay the fee and i do not thing so that it will be too chip, so i just want that part but i cant get it  from here. i read the reviews before , but i did not believe  i though it may be better but it was all bad item so do no buy this

Reviews.Title: was ok for a bit

Reviews.Content: worked great right out of the box BUT then it started dropping wi-fi connection and apps were not loading or they loaded and then disappeared. finally just returned and got money back. would try again as the seller handled this wonderfully and were very accommodating and understanding that a bad tablet got thru their checklists.

Reviews.Title: 10" Google Android 4.0 Tablet
Reviews.Author: Joanna Florez
Reviews.Content: Very Unhappy with this Tablet.  It Froze after a little over a month and i have not been able to use it.  Per return policy, this item had to be returned within 30 days but, as i said - just after the 30 days it Froze-  so i paid this money for nothing.  I do not recommend this item.

Reviews.Title: Ugh
Reviews.Author: RoxxqStarPiink
Reviews.Content: Waste of money... I gave it to my mother and it broke within a month, not even a scratch on the thing.. Wish I could've gotten a refund.. (Written from my iPad )

Reviews.Title: Both of Them BROKE!!
Reviews.Author: Terri Torres
Reviews.Content: Both ordered stopped working within 30 days of purchase!! Thank Goodness I bought the extra warranty. Do not buy this product

Reviews.Title: Don't bother
Reviews.Author: Eve Chute
Reviews.Content: slow to respond, no instructions, feels cheap. I returned it and it took 12 emails to get an address and an AU (authorization) number.

Reviews.Title: google tablet
Reviews.Author: brian estrin
Reviews.Content: i love the google tableti use it for email and searching the internet and communication with peopleit's a excellent item

Reviews.Title: tiptop
Reviews.Author: tiptop
Reviews.Content: My neice's loved them. They came in no time and were so easy to  use. This was a very good buy. I recommend this to anyone.

Reviews.Title: I ordered this and got this delivered to my friends place in USA
Reviews.Author: Gunnar Axel
Reviews.Content: I live in Iceland and could no resend to have it rebotoed because this stopped working 3-4 days after I got this item.  The seller assured me that I could return this later when someone went to USA.  Now I got an reply that this never arrived to them and they can do nothing.  I send this to them in end of November and now I don't get reply's any more STAY CLEAR FROM THIS PRODUCT AND THIS SELLER.

Reviews.Title: BASURA /CRAP
Reviews.Author: Jose Batista
Reviews.Content: La peor decisión que pude tomar ...desde las versiones anteriores tienen problemas con la maldita tableta y no lo han reparado.  Llegó, funcionó un mes y nunca más cargó la batería.malísimo producto ... hay otras marcas igual de baratas y al menos funcionan ...  que clase de basura ...The worst decision that could take ... from previous versions have problems with the damn tablet and have not repaired. Llegfuncionun month and never more the battery charge. bad bad product ... there are other brands just as cheap and less work ... that kind of crap ...

Reviews.Title: If uou buy it, you will lose your money.
Reviews.Author: David Peralta
Reviews.Content: It's money wasted buying this tablet. Now i bought a Tablet Blackberry Playbook and its better than this Flytouch tablet... it's much expensive this tablet...

Reviews.Title: Hmmm
Reviews.Author: duwayne
Reviews.Content: I will never order another tablet unless it is a Samsung or an actual ipad. Made to many bad choices trying to go cheaper.

Reviews.Title: good bang for the buck
Reviews.Author: cc
Reviews.Content: I wanted a tablet for the kids to play interactive games on that if it broke I wouldnt feel bad about only paying a little over a hundred for.  It does everything a regular google android would do.  The screen might be a little untouchy but its something you get used to, but really worth the money.  Decent quality!

Reviews.Title: It's a very cheap knock-off. Within a matter of about 5 minutes after receiving ths tablet the screen craked.
Reviews.Author: Jodian Nelson
Reviews.Content: It's a very cheap knock-off. Within a matter of about 5 minutes after receiving this tablet the screen craked. IThis was a waiste of $100.00

Reviews.Title: suckkkkks
Reviews.Author: nina
Reviews.Content: i thought that i was saving money by buying this tablet but everything stops working after a while so i wasted money. don't buy it. its like some kinda chinese knock off crap.

Reviews.Title: Got it and got rid of it....
Reviews.Author: Sara Tackett
Reviews.Content: We got the tablet just mostly for playing games on.. The first day it seemed fine, the second day ok and the third day I noticed that the screen top was loose and coming apart from the tablet, the tablet would shut off automatically and then it completely reset itself wiping everything out.  I sold it to someone else that had been looking for a tablet...  I will stick to dragon touch tablets for the cheaper tablets...

Reviews.Title: Excelente producto
Reviews.Author: Victor Ferreri
Reviews.Content: El proveedor es responsable y El producto es excelente y contiene todas las especificaciones del proveedor, lo recomendamos y son de buena calidad.

Reviews.Title: No me enviaron lo que compre
Reviews.Author: Domingo Curiel
Reviews.Content: Estoy muy muy molesto, no me enviaron el producto que compre y quiero regresarlo, esto es una estafa, como publican un producto y envian otro??

Reviews.Title: 10" google android 4.0 tablet dañana
Reviews.Author: CARMEN TERESA SAENZ
Reviews.Content: Buenas Tardes!Les comento que la tablet tuvo problemas en escender a penas la destape para probarla, luego funcionó. Luego, se daño a la siguiente semana que la recibi, no arranca, se queda como muerta.  El producto malisimo. Hay posibilidad que devuelvan el dinero?  que debo hacer?

Reviews.Title: I replaced this with another tablet.
Reviews.Author: Renee
Reviews.Content: The tablet I bought for her at Christmas tore up within a week. I got this tablet in a timely manner. I got it for my daughter and she really likes it.

Reviews.Title: this product is cheap
Reviews.Author: Abigail Berg
Reviews.Content: We used this product sporadically for 3 months.  The screen is often unresponsive, and froze often.  The battery also failed to charge.  I would recommend spending the extra money to purchase a better name brand tablet.

Reviews.Title: Flytouch tablet
Reviews.Author: Roy J. Warner "Roy Boy"
Reviews.Content: Not sure what we were buying at the time, but glad we got these tablets.  They work great for us sitting in the living room watching tv.  When we need to look up something, catch up on the news, etc.  They are the perfect item to keep near the remotes & recliners. Don't have to drag the laptop around or use the nice computer in the den.  If you don't want to do much or expect too much, this perfect for inbetween computing. We got the case with attachable keyboard to use too.  We both use both the keyboard & just the on screen keyboard.  It can be slow sometimes, like all wifi, but most of the time it's perfectly fine. For the price you can't go wrong.  The owner's manual is downright worthless tho, & you cannot find one on the web to compensate. Also the print & size of the manual is ridiculous.  You need a magnifying glass to read it & it doesn't cover much that is helpful at all. You can tell it's translated from Chinese because the wording is so bad. It's just serverely incomplete & hurts your eyes. We basically had to figure out EVERYTHING about the Tablet on our own. Someone dropped the ball on this aspect of the purchase. I expect we'll upgrade to a better tablet soon tho.

Reviews.Title: 10" google adroid vs kindle fire
Reviews.Author: alysa stukes
Reviews.Content: Purchased this tablet for a 7 year, mostly based on price. It was delivered promptly.  My daughter had difficulties moving from one app next app without tapping the screen very hard.  After three months it stopped working all together.  Seller returned most of money - return shipping cost and repacking fee.  Just purchased a kindle fire instead.

Reviews.Title: Good & Bad
Reviews.Author: Tanya Ferrell "{TINK}"
Reviews.Content: I have purchased this 11/07/12 and when I got it, it was good but now its not trying to connect with anything. This is suckish and I want to return it but im afraid its too late. Please don't waste money buying this. At first it'll work then next it want.

Reviews.Title: Stopped working at all
Reviews.Author: ivanna
Reviews.Content: While it was working the apps took too long to open would freeze. Internet as well. And only after a month of use stopped working all together. I didn't push the charger all the way in  did everything by instructions. And I can't return it anymore. Poor quality.

Reviews.Title: My mother...
Reviews.Author: christopher pressley
Reviews.Content: who is 71 yoa and always has hated computers had me order her this system and now that she has gotten used to it uses it daily, thanks.

Reviews.Title: Sucky service and the product didn't work
Reviews.Author: Kari
Reviews.Content: I had gotten the tablet for work and when I used different programs, they would just shut off. Very frustrating.

Reviews.Title: Worst piece of junk ever total waste of money
Reviews.Author: kwj3pa
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my son for Christmas, it worked 2 days and the screen turned white.  A friend looked at it and said that the LCD is bad.  DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY.  Spend more for a better product!

Reviews.Title: unhappy customer
Reviews.Author: chad leque
Reviews.Content: I purchased this for a Christmas gift. Turned it on to make sure it worked then put it directly back in the box. After opening it on Xmas morning it worked fine for a day. The screen froze up and couldn't even turn it on. The screen is so cheaply made that it scratched when you touched it. So I sent it back at my own expense(11.00 for shipping when it free to have it shipped to me) and requested my money back. When my refund was deposited it was 15.00 short of what I originally paid for it plus the 11.00 I had to pay to send it back. I sent an email to your company but have yet to hear a response. I will never buy another product from your company again!!! I'm 25.00 down from the original purchase price!!! This is uncalled for since it was the product being defective. You really need to have better customer service!!! Buyers beware do not buy from this company.

Reviews.Title: Very good.
Reviews.Author: FAYCAL BOUSSAID
Reviews.Content: A very useful tablet ,  presents a very good quality to price ratio . I like the several ports: 2 usb, network cable, etc...

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Michelle temple
Reviews.Content: Great product and amazing shipping....arrived way before the date....would recommend for anyone...was in great condition when we received it also

Reviews.Title: I don't like it
Reviews.Author: Sabina Gomez Nateras
Reviews.Content: It is not working properly. It freezes a lot and sometimes it is hard to turn it on. I do not recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Did not fill my expectations.
Reviews.Author: cecilia
Reviews.Content: The first days this tablet  rich my expectations,After a month I start to have problems with it, and last  week the tablet just stop working.

Reviews.Title: Do NOT WASTE YOUR TIME OR MONEY
Reviews.Author: A. Burke "clean freak"
Reviews.Content: I receivecd this as a Christmas gift.  Worst thing ever.  After charging overnight, I did the basic set up and it was acting weird.  I then took it to a friend who works on computers professionally.  They did a bit more, and gave it back so I could download desired programs.  What a joke.  When I tried to add ownership to main screen, I typed in my name and ended up with Yxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx,  no where near keys pressed.  Everytime I went to settings, it would revert back to Wallpaper and even with rebooting, the camera came on multiple times, without request.  I work on a million dollar computer program every day, so it is not like am unfamiliar with systems.  It was a waste of my time and energy, and the person who gave me this POS will receive a piece of coal next Christmas...  Oh, and the manufacturers gave a refund to purchaser without return.  They must know that the best use of this thing is a coaster.

Reviews.Title: glitchy
Reviews.Author: steve reece
Reviews.Content: After opening and using the Google tablet by Flytouch I find it's touchscreen to be glitchy, I would not recommend it to anyone

Reviews.Title: Water Damage
Reviews.Author: N2OBS
Reviews.Content: Do not buy this product, mine came with water damage screen.  Gift was attempted to return but they would not because of the return was past 2 week.

Reviews.Title: not a good idea
Reviews.Author: sunflower
Reviews.Content: I recived a flytouch 10.1 tablet for christmas.After 3 days it wouldnt work.So after many emails to the company.I was told to send it back still under warranty.Well after many more emails to find out where my replacment was.I got no where with this company.I called them and that was worthless.The women I talked to was rude and could not speak english very well.And she also hung up on me.When I tried to call back no one answered.And I know they where still open by there hours I have.Now I am with out a tablet and or the money for it. I would never by from this company again.

Reviews.Title: Not Worth the money
Reviews.Author: Antwan Worsham
Reviews.Content: The Tablet is too bulky and not easy to handle.  The touch screen is hard to deal with.  Don't waise your time.

Reviews.Title: Christmas Gifts
Reviews.Author: Ron
Reviews.Content: Was given as Christmas gift to my wife and niece seems it is touchy as if you are in another part of the house picking up the WiFi.

Reviews.Title: The kids love it!
Reviews.Author: MELINDA REFFALT
Reviews.Content: This is a really nice tablet for the price.When we first got ours it turned on and when I went to set it up for my son it wouldn't turn on again. I contacted the seller and they were great. Turns out there is a tiny reset button on the side/bottom that got pushed by the Keyboard case I bought to put it in. The seller reset the tablet and sent it back right away and now so far so good.

Reviews.Title: Junk. Do not buy.
Reviews.Author: Ryan
Reviews.Content: Had this tablet for not even a week and didn't work.  First it wouldn't stay linked to the wifi.  Then netflixs app wouldn't work.  Spend an hour on the phone with netflix,  they had no idea what the error code meant. Went online paided for a update.  Updated it and still wouldn't work.  To update these you have to down load the software on a computer, Then hook the tablet to the computer and install the update.  So if you don't have a computer, you can't up date it.  Ended up paying for shipping to return it.  Now I bought a used ipad, have had the ipad for over 6month and not a single problem.  You get what you pay for.

Reviews.Title: The best gift
Reviews.Author: mary ann richardson
Reviews.Content: This Tablet did everything My daughter-in-law wanted it to do.she cannot put it down she loved it great Gift For the price

Reviews.Title: broke my kid's heart
Reviews.Author: Karina "Karina"
Reviews.Content: This tablet was a  problem from the get go, kept on freezing up, would not ever buy this product no thanks.

Reviews.Title: Its ok
Reviews.Author: Leticia Rocha
Reviews.Content: Freezes too much, otherwise pretty neat. bought for an 8 and 9 yr old. Its a bit slow but it has plenty of apps to choose from.

Reviews.Title: defective product
Reviews.Author: Susan J. Latimer
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my teenager and within two weeks it would not work - would not charge.  Sent it back to the sellers and they have not sent a replacement after 3 weeks.

Reviews.Title: Dont get it.
Reviews.Author: juspassinthrew
Reviews.Content: My son was so excited. Could not download anything. Bought three different kinds for Christmas. Everyone was sent back. I t was not just this one. It seemed to freeze. upon downloading. Dont know what its problem was. But Amazon was great.

Reviews.Title: desepcionada
