Reviews.Content: compre una dos tablet google en el mes de noviembre y al encenderla se quedo pegada solo aparecio en la pantalla la palabra android ademas tiene dificultad para cargarse quisiera saber como hago para que e la revisen o que tengo que hacer pues siento que perdi mi dinero y el regalo del nino jesus de mi hijo. Necesito urgente una rspuesta no he podido usarla y no tengo ni el dinero ni la tabket. Pense que al comprarla tanto google como amazone tendrian que tener una garantia

Reviews.Title: why.
Reviews.Author: robert c. ford jr.
Reviews.Content: i cant watch movies on it.why? other than that its fine.what do rooted mean. and why is this tablet rooted?

Reviews.Title: The plastic screen
Reviews.Author: T. Oberman
Reviews.Content: I like the product because of the internet access. I like this product because of the USB capability, which the iPad does not have. I like the speed of this product as well. BUT I have to PUSH so hard on the screen for anything to happen. I was going to return it, because I thought it was faulty, but as I read in other reviews, I guess this is normal for this product.

Reviews.Title: Need a return address/ product does not work
Reviews.Author: Tricie Goethe
Reviews.Content: I ordered this product around the Thanksgiving holiday and gave it as a gift for Christmas. It turns on and stays stuck on the android logo. I have tried to reset it and it does not work. The return policy is easy enough and a replacement or exchange was not available so I have to get a refund and find one the same size for the key pad carrier.

Reviews.Title: Disappointing to say the least.....
Reviews.Author: Karen Ann Campbell "Karen"
Reviews.Content: We purchased this for our daughter for Christmas.  It worked for 2 days then just stopped. There is no customer service number to call, no trouble shooting guideline.  It was her favorite gift now I have to send it back and wait for the refund to purchase another.  Should have stuck with a name brand smaller screen.

Reviews.Title: Like the Plague...Stay Away
Reviews.Author: Roy E. Scherrer
Reviews.Content: Hard to deal with the vendor of this product...refused phone contact and I suspect this is a "garage" or home business that hasnt quite got the hang of "customer service".  Couldnt get tech answers question and finally sent it back, after the GPS dongle wouldnt attach..then she had the nerve to charge me a re-stocking fee..also, every download of a app failed...STAY AWAY!!!

Reviews.Title: I returned this Item
Reviews.Author: Juris Zarins
Reviews.Content: Touch screen was to sensitive..  No problem with return... Everything went smoothly... ok ok ok ok yep yep  yep yep

Reviews.Title: not as good as expected
Reviews.Author: ardis
Reviews.Content: Waiting to hear fom customer service.so far device is frustrating.Does not hold a charge for very long and freezes up in middle of a game and needs to be restarted. Not good for my 6 year old grandson.Hope this can be resolved quickly or replaced

Reviews.Title: worst ever
Reviews.Author: Kay Moore
Reviews.Content: When I received this tablet my first thought is it is the perfect size to take with me but right out of the box it had issues.  Booted it up once and it wouldn't boot up again, and after contacting the seller they sent instructions to do a flash jump and a second download. A product right out of the box should not have to have tehnical issues just to boot up.  It wouldn't shut down and had to push the reset button to get it to shut down.  It wasn't worth all the hassles to get it to bootup for the first time, and never got to use it to see what it could do because it wouldn't operate correctly.  When booting up the first time it sat with that Android logo forever and then after setting the NEVER sleep option it never worked again.  Perfecty size tablet but horrible product.

Reviews.Title: Not what I expected..the screen coloring was dark
Reviews.Author: lorraine hudson
Reviews.Content: This product is not worth the money I got it for my 8year old daughter..the screen is very dark and you can hardly see anything... I don't liked this product at all..

Reviews.Title: Nifty Tablet
Reviews.Author: Kelley
Reviews.Content: This is doing exactly what I wanted. I am a little confused about some features but will work it out. Would love a more detailed instruction sheet for those who are computer challenge :) All in all, I can read my books and check my email...life is good.

Reviews.Title: Its ok.
Reviews.Author: Pen15
Reviews.Content: I got this tablet yesterday and the battery really sucks! it charges in like no time and then about 5 minutes on it and the battery dies. If you want a cheap piece of s*** and this is for you. so disappointed with it.

Reviews.Title: Awful tablet horiffic service
Reviews.Author: KitKat
Reviews.Content: I was excited about this purchase.  Upon receipt of my first tablet it came with electronic lines running up and down. I paid for and exchanged for another one.  This process was quick and painless.  Upon receipt of my second tablet while inserting the SD card the machine swallowed it. I was approved for another replacement which I never received.  Engine29 never responded to my call or e-mails.  This process from begining to end went from Oct 12 to Jan 3.  I had to file an A-Z claim through Amazon to get this unprofesional situation resolved.  In addition my SD Card was never returned to me.  I say the tablet stinks and Engine29 lacks everything.  I would NEVER purchase from them again!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Not great
Reviews.Author: Breonna
Reviews.Content: Was very slow and Skype wouldn't work...we went with the blackberry one instead, which is working out much better that this one!! :( sorry, I don't like giving bad reviews, but this really wasn't worth my money... :(

Reviews.Title: GREAT BUY!!!
Reviews.Author: Julie
Reviews.Content: The tablet I bought for my husband is AWESOME! Inexpensive and just what he was looking for.  He can skype, facebook, play games and keep all his information handy for his job. It was a real find!

Reviews.Title: PLASTIC BS!!!
Reviews.Author: Kimberly Patrick
Reviews.Content: It's frozen and I can't get back into it!!! Only thing showing is the email/passwords screen which it won't take... As of now It's a piece of plastic BS!!!

Reviews.Title: no oovoo
Reviews.Author: Nicole Decastro
Reviews.Content: I  dislike I can't really use oovoo other than that it's pretty good.The pic quality is pretty good as well

Reviews.Title: Bad Screen
Reviews.Author: deana henderson
Reviews.Content: I had two tablets sent to me and both of them were bad.  The screen was bubbly and it didn't work most of the time.  I asked them to refund all my money including shipping of both tablets, but they only refunded tablet price.

Reviews.Title: microphone?
Reviews.Author: connie duncan
Reviews.Content: The product worls well, except the microphone. Skype, is not usable, because the person you are talking tp, can not hear you.

Reviews.Title: great.product ecstatic nephew
Reviews.Author: arondil
Reviews.Content: I had never been a real proprietor to the idea of owning a tablet because I have a gaming laptop a smart phone and a work desktop but, I bought this flytouch as a gift for my 10 year old nephew for his birthday and he and his whole family fight over whose turn it is to use it. This product met my expectations so much it has made me decide to start actually considering to buying a tablet for myself.it had one digger problem with the Google play store where it wasn't recognizing it, but I called the Google help line at around midnight and they had known exactly what to do to get people back online. So not only is it a great product but it comes with great technical support 24/7. I wholly recommend this gift as a starter tablet for anyone who wants to see what the hype is all about.

Reviews.Title: It's great for what I do
Reviews.Author: Donna
Reviews.Content: I purchased this item as a gift for my husband. He plays cheskk and checks his email. It's great. He is learning everyday the different things he can do with it.

Reviews.Title: Adequate
Reviews.Author: Karen Fitzgerald
Reviews.Content: The 4GB is a little small and fills fast. It's my first tablet, so I can't say too much as I have nothing to compare it to. So far, it's doing all I ask of it.

Reviews.Title: Android
Reviews.Author: Doug Mishler
Reviews.Content: I received it with no way to register it, no instructions.  Now it has been frozen for two days and I have no recourse, except to send it back.  How do I do that? I would have liked to have the barest operating information delivered with it, as wellHOW DO WE FIX THIS?  Evidently the Amazon (A to Z) policy doesn't cover this transaction for some mystical reason.  Hell, I got all that with a Blackberry. It came with a 1 month warranty.  We ordered it on Aug 14 and it arrived on Aug 16.  It worked fine until just before Thanksgiving.  Since then, we have been given about a dozen phone numbers, (including one in China) to try to fix this.  They did give us 1/2 the money we spent,(not including headphones, case, and any other accessories).  I believe this piece of junk was cobbled together from 2-3 other defective pieces, and sent along.  Engine 29,(the "seller") has never contacted us, although Amazon did do their best to remedy the problem.  Do not buy anything if the words Engine 29 are mentioned, on your order form.  (Just a heads up).  You're welcome.

Reviews.Title: Good tablet
Reviews.Author: SARBEAR
Reviews.Content: This is a good table.  Had trouble with the device turning on after I had already had it on and then turned it off.  Was returned and will be getting a new one. When I first got the table it work perfert I loved all the feactures, but then for some reason it decided not to turn on again.

Reviews.Title: 10" GOOGLE ANDROID 4.0 TABLET 4GB FLYTOUCH 10.1 VC882 EPAD LAPTOP WIFI CAMERA HDMI Support External 3G, Flash 10.1 Cortex A8,WIF
Reviews.Author: The Inspector "Falcon"
Reviews.Content: Sorry to say this product is far from good, bought 2 within the first few days the USB port failed. The unit drops wireless connections very often to a point where no matter what you do you cannot connect back, and that is after doing a factory reset. you have to reset the unit to often because of apps that stop responding. One of the units after putting it on would give a blank screen with vertical colored lines. Guess what you have to reset again. without prejudice i cannot recommend this product to any one.

Reviews.Title: JUNK save your money and time
Reviews.Author: Matthew Williams
Reviews.Content: THIS is the biggest junk pile I have ever seen. this unit is not good for anything but shooting with a .45 colt!!!anger birds locks up unit , Skype locks up unit, browser locks up unit. and a simple rest does not work, it takes a factory reset to reset this unit to even come on . with the manual has no instuctions on how to do. youtube. video is where you find that answer  after you get apps loaded and game play saved -if you get that far (IT CRASHES OR LOCKS UP) it is slow slow slow. tried software up date and still same result. DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY  The old saying is true (YOU GET WHAT YOU PAY FOR)  Me I saved up and bought an ipad mini and have not had a min. trouble out of it.

Reviews.Title: 10" google android
Reviews.Author: Nag
Reviews.Content: The product was good..HDMI output was the main reason i purchased it..since it was not working i had to return it...i would hesitate in the future to purchase big tickwet electronic items from amazon as i have to pay shipping charges in case of returns .

Reviews.Title: fly touch 10 is a dud
Reviews.Author: IsabellaFarms
Reviews.Content: its good for what it is, but serious dud even from a lower class product. maybe custom firmware we can only hope for this model/brand/firmware

Reviews.Title: Could be better
Reviews.Author: michael crippen
Reviews.Content: Worked pretty good at first. As I downloaded apps and added a 8GB memory card, it got slower and has had problems turning on. It has also had problems maintaining a solid WiFi connection with a perfect WiFi signal. 1-10.....  I give it a 2-3.

Reviews.Title: google 10 android
Reviews.Author: ROBIN
Reviews.Content: I really like the Google 10 Android. Took awhile to figure out how to connect to my laptop with usb cord. not any instructions that are any good! you have to just guess at most of everything!But all in all it does everything I wanted it to do.

Reviews.Title: Wireless, SD Card, HDMI dont work
Reviews.Author: Dinkleberry
Reviews.Content: 2.45GB actual storage space not 4gb, 768 ram not 1gb, SD Cards do not work, Wireless does not work, HDMI output does not work. Now its freezing up and cant be used at all. Sending back for refund

Reviews.Title: HAPPY
Reviews.Author: next
Reviews.Content: THIS TABLET TURNED OUT TO BE GREAT FOR THE MONEY GAVE ONE TO BOTH MY SONS ANT THEY LOVE THEM.WAITING FOR FREE SHIPPING TO GET ONE FOR ME.

Reviews.Title: It's good
Reviews.Author: Quissi
Reviews.Content: it was a gift for my nephew... then I don't use it, but i saw his really happy with it. It isnt the fastest in the market but is so good to learn and introduce in the technology's world

Reviews.Title: Google Tablet
Reviews.Author: Adrian
Reviews.Content: It's ok better put more money to get better quality in imagine and everything overall. Good thing it's for a 10 yr.

Reviews.Title: 10" google android
Reviews.Author: Sylvia
Reviews.Content: Stopped working when I tried to Skype my Grandson. I sent him the 7" and it works great he says.

Reviews.Title: Disappointed!
Reviews.Author: Kar2012
Reviews.Content: We wanted to get our 7 year old daughter a tablet for her birthday, but wasn't looking to spend the price of an iPad. I read the reviews for this tablet and thought I may have some issues with it, but didn't think they would be anything too troublesome.When I received the tablet, I charged it overnight ( it was charging for about 8 hours). The next morning, it turned on just fine. I downloaded a few apps and everything was working great....until about 30 minutes later. The screen froze and then the tablet shut off. As much as I attempted, it would not turn back on. Now, I know I didn't spend as much as the iPad, but for what I did pay, the tablet still should have worked! Unfortunately, I would not recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: i could not advise you to but it
Reviews.Author: Mwafrika
Reviews.Content: this tablet look good and appealing to the eyes when you see it on the web, but once you physically get it, it doesnt have that feeling of a tablet, first the sceen is not responding correctly, actually the screen looks like it made up of recycled plastic, you make a mistake or dropping it, thats it, i left the tablet on for more than 12 hours it still showed 91% charged ( thats when its still new)no matter how long you charge it it will be never be 100% fully charged, as for shipping it came right on time, for all them customers out there, this is not the tablet unless you dont have any use of your 130$ for,

Reviews.Title: had to keep restting it
Reviews.Author: divinegirl
Reviews.Content: I got this product and the first day i got it it work ok for a little while then it would shut its self of and i could not just turn it back on i would have to reset it to get it to come back on. It is also very slow so slow you can't even surf the web on it i bought it just to go to my online classes, it would not even open or it was taking so long i gave up on it i waited over an hour though thats a little rediculas. do not buy this product if you want to get on the net with it..

Reviews.Title: Don't buy it
Reviews.Author: Andres Meseguer Rojas "Meseguer"
Reviews.Content: It uses a Chinese android modified version. It does not allow you to donwload from google market/play and practically all apps are NOT supported by this

Reviews.Title: tablet
Reviews.Author: Percy
Reviews.Content: Excellent product! Arrived on time. very accurate as described. nice brand, perfect size, well packed it, I got the product as it was decribed on line.

Reviews.Title: Android Tablet
Reviews.Author: Cheyenne Butt
Reviews.Content: For being aroung the busy holiday it was shipped very quickly and i will be recieving it today i have tried out the product yet but when i do i will finish this up

Reviews.Title: Didnt Receive the correct item
Reviews.Author: frisky
Reviews.Content: Still waiting on the correct item and I am still holding on to the in correct item I still want the correct tablet and I need to send back the old one.
